titleInfo.title: Subdivision of lots nos. 11, 12 &13 in the late James Hughson's survey in Hamilton

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; sheet 44 x 28 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso.

mods.note: Title is uncertain as penciled writing is barely legible. "May 18/58" is penciled under title. Streets appearing on map include, John Street North, Catharine Street North, Henry Street [now Cannon Street East], and Lind Street [now Robert Street]. Land was originally owned by Nathaniel Hughson. He named several streets after members of his family including Catharine Street. "No 40, Drawer 5" is written along the upper edge.
